column4: So, exactly what CAN I play with Totem?  Everything I try to play fails...  An avi file, a DVD...  I can't find anything that tells me where to install additional codecs or whatever.
Also, mplayer doesn't appear in any repositories, is there some trick to getting it too?
open a terminal and type "apt-cache search mplayer" to find your pkg name (there are many mplayers)
